医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型抗菌化合物有望预防牙周病牙周病是由牙周病原菌感染引起的影响口腔和内部健康的炎症性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-antibacterial-compound-shows-promise-for-preventing-periodontal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-antibacterial-compound-shows-promise-for-preventing-periodontal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c428c21f-3c09-4d4d-b9eb-902334ddc599 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 09:58:52 -0400 New antibacterial compound shows promise for preventing periodontal disease
研究引入了一种绘制蛋白质-受体相互作用图谱的新方法FDA 批准的药物中，有三分之一的药物靶向分布在人体细胞表面的单个受体超家族。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-introduces-a-novel-approach-to-mapping- Protein-receptor-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-introduces-a-novel-approach-to-mapping- Protein-receptor-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e3c89d6-4a74-487d-beef-5a6b5fe3bb3a Wed, 28 Aug 2024 09:53:10 -0400 Study introduces a novel approach to mapping protein-receptor interactions
CDCA7 被确定为半甲基化传感的关键参与者DNA甲基化是甲基附着在DNA分子胞嘧啶碱基上的过程，是DNA表观遗传标记的主要方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/CDCA7-identified-as-key-player-in-hemimethylation-sensing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/CDCA7-identified-as-key-player-in-hemimethylation-sensing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ad08559-7233-45a1-a8b6-a716720057b3 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 08:05:06 -0400 CDCA7 identified as key player in hemimethylation sensing
创新的浆果皮肤喷雾剂针对医院获得的细菌VTT 开发了一种基于纳米纤维素和野生浆果抗菌化合物的皮肤喷雾剂，可用于在手术前治疗伤口并消除医院获得的细菌，例如 MRSA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Innovative-berry-based-skin-spray-targets-hospital-acquired-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Innovative-berry-based-skin-spray-targets-hospital-acquired-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341eb50e-aec9-435f-acfe-a9511d5d6cc2 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 07:34:33 -0400 Innovative berry-based skin spray targets hospital-acquired bacteria
Synexa Life Sciences 加入 My Green Lab 认证计划Synexa Life Sciences 是一家为制药、生物技术和 CRO 行业提供生物标志物和生物分析解决方案的全球供应商，自豪地宣布加入 My Green Lab 认证计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Synexa-Life-Sciences-enrols-in-My-Green-Lab-certification-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Synexa-Life-Sciences-enrols-in-My-Green-Lab-certification-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89c91f86-9be7-4625-b2ca-885d76fe7fe0 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Synexa Life Sciences enrols in My Green Lab certification program
细胞治疗商业化：简化您的细胞治疗商业化之路将细胞治疗临床试验推进到第一阶段是一个激动人心的时刻，标志着一个重要的里程碑。有许多治疗开发商致力于满足肿瘤学、自身免疫、再生医学和其他领域的关键患者需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Cell-therapy-commercialization-Streamline-your-path-to-cell-therapy-commercialization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Cell-therapy-commercialization-Streamline-your-path-to-cell-therapy-commercialization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb2b4eb8-5960-4e9d-aca4-a1e67e5791ea Wed, 28 Aug 2024 07:18:00 -0400 Cell therapy commercialization: Streamline your path to cell therapy commercialization
灰光成像已通过 ISO 13485 认证2023 年 11 月，我们自豪地宣布，Graylight Imaging 已成功获得 ISO 13485 认证，这体现了我们对医疗设备设计和制造最高质量标准的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Graylight-imaging-is-ISO-13485-certified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Graylight-imaging-is-ISO-13485-certified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c78e4a9f-8d54-4db3-9fe9-2ac8fc0f0d48 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 07:16:00 -0400 Graylight imaging is ISO 13485 certified
战略合作伙伴关系彻底改变尿液检测Alpha Laboratories Ltd.（英国汉普郡）自豪地宣布，它已与 Clinical Design Technologies Ltd.（英国德文郡）建立战略合作伙伴关系，以营销和支持世界上第一个数字封闭式尿液检测系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Strategic-partnership-to-revolutionize-urine-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Strategic-partnership-to-revolutionize-urine-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74af55d0-babe-431e-a1b6-f63d18dca158 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 07:05:00 -0400 Strategic partnership to revolutionize urine testing
SciY 和 Allchemy 宣布战略分销协议SciY 自豪地宣布与 Allchemy 达成战略分销协议。Allchemy 是人工智能 (AI) 驱动药物发现的先驱，由著名专家 Sara Szymkuć 博士和 Bartosz Grzybowski 教授共同创立。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/SciY-and-Allchemy-announce-strategic-distribution-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/SciY-and-Allchemy-announce-strategic-distribution-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eafb3634-19ef-4a82-8315-7efae3531228 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 06:43:00 -0400 SciY and Allchemy announce strategic distribution agreement
AHN myLab® 96 孔板离心机随着单管 PCR 反应的时代迅速被基于微孔板的 PCR 装置所取代，科学家们需要能够胜任这项任务的工具。 AHN myLab® PCR 板旋转器旨在为所有 PCR 板应用提供可靠的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/AHN-myLabc2ae-96-well-plate-centrifuge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/AHN-myLabc2ae-96-well-plate-centrifuge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dc43c1a-7e84-459d-b497-029b4c9dc1ea Wed, 28 Aug 2024 06:42:00 -0400 AHN myLab® 96 well plate centrifuge
